title: Magnesium Glycinate
overview: Magnesium Glycinate is a highly bioavailable form of magnesium, created by bonding magnesium to the amino acid glycine. Known for its gentle effect on the digestive system, this compound is widely recognized for its role in supporting healthy muscle function, nervous system balance, and overall well-being. Magnesium Glycinate appears as a white to off-white, odorless powder with excellent solubility and stability.
features: Superior bioavailability for optimal absorption in the body
Gentle on the digestive system, reducing the likelihood of gastrointestinal discomfort
Supports muscle relaxation, reducing muscle cramps and spasms
Promotes healthy nervous system function, aiding in stress and anxiety reduction
Ideal for use in formulations aimed at improving sleep quality and cognitive function

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Commonly used in supplements to support magnesium levels, muscle health, and nerve function
